title: Gastric Cancer Expert System
description: A Mamdani fuzzy inference system implemented in MATLAB, utilizing 67 expert-defined rules to assess gastric cancer risk levels. The system processes 13 clinical risk factors to classify individuals into different risk categories, facilitating early detection and treatment.

title: Diabetes Expert System
description: A machine learning-based expert system for early diagnosis of diabetes, trained on the Diabetes Prediction Dataset from Kaggle. The model leverages a rule-enhanced pipeline with feature engineering and classification optimization to ensure high accuracy. It demonstrates robust generalization capabilities, making it a reliable support tool for clinical decision-making.

title: Heart Disease Expert System
description: A Mamdani fuzzy inference system designed to diagnose heart disease by analyzing key cardiovascular indicators. The system integrates clinician-validated IF-THEN rules to provide accurate and cost-effective prognosis.
